step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, with some minor variations in the left shoulder. Try to keep your shoulders moving smoothly in a circular motion.
You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! The movements are quite consistent between repetitions, especially in your right shoulder. Keep up the good form.
Your right shoulder movement is excellent here. For the left shoulder, aim for a slightly more consistent backward and downward motion to match the right side.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with your shoulder rolls! Focus on making each roll a smooth circle, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow.
